QuestData.Title: Powering the Defenses
QuestData.Description: What few soulpriests we don't have on the front lines are working fervently to maintain Auchindoun's defenses. They aren't going to be able to keep it up much longer alone.$B$BSoulbinder Tuulani went inside the nearby Tomb of Lights to retrieve a backup power pylon and hasn't returned. I need you to find her and get her and the pylon back here safely.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Soulbinder Tuulani in the Tomb of Lights.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Soulbinder Tuulani in the Tomb of Lights.
QuestData.RewardText: You look like you can fight. We need to get out of here!
